/usr/bin/g++  CMakeFiles/dynamic_shared_memory.dir/dynamic_shared_memory.cu.o -o dynamic_shared_memory  /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so  -L"/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib" -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
